s.text: Gigot believes this may make no difference, since "[I]t doesn't matter how corrupt you think the messenger is, or how partisan, if the case [presented to Congress] is strong itself."
David Gergen ( The McLaughlin Group ) believes the trip shows that China, not Japan, is the most powerful country in Asia right now.
The bizarre bit is that this particular quotation--Clinton "rises to the occasion" during important presidential moments--seems noticeably ordinary.
Wolf Blitzer ( Late Edition ) and Tim Russert (NBC's Meet the Press ) ask Starr's spokesperson this very question about 10 different times, but he declines to respond in each instance.
